Office: (289) 670 2494   Cell: (647) 407 2602      

NPC Building and Renovations Limited is a fully licensed Renovation Company. Meeting the needs of clients is our goal. We are pleased to provide personalized service, custom designs and work one-on-one with all our clients to ensure that the final product is just as they envisioned. Our professional workers will work diligently to ensure the quality of our work.

services: Our services goals go from framing, drywall, electrical & plumbing (subcontracted via licensed trades-persons), carpentry, basement finishing, tiling,flooring, kitchen, bathroom, decking, fence, garage, open concepts and demolitions, sun decks and exterior building.
warranty_terms: NPC Renovations provides  two years of warranty in all its completed renovation's projects

At Renovations By Matt we are committed to excellent service and quality workmanship. Whether your looking for a TO-DO LIST you cant seem to finish, Plumbing issues and installations by our licensed staff or a Full Reno Project, We are here to Help 

From designing to finished products, our expert staff will make your renovation ideas come to life. 

We use top quality trades and materials to ensure the repair or project is done right. 
 
 
Email or Call us for more Details.
 
We Offer Plumbing and Waterproofing Services.  
 
Services include: Plumbing repairs and new installations, drain services, waterproofing and More!!
products: PLUMBING FIXTURES, BATHROOM FIXTURES, DRYWALL PAINT TRIM WORK AND MORE!
services:
Drywalling, painting, framing, tiling, Decks, Baths, Kitchens & More.

We Will Provide Quality Workmanship @ Great Prices

profile:
Anything is possible when it comes to building or extending your home, homeowners today can simply build or extend their homes to a home they had always dreamed of. We, at SABAT Construction, can make your dream home become a reality in a matter of weeks.

SABAT Construction is an Ontario based residential and commercial construction company that is committed to customers’ satisfaction. We pride ourselves on our excellent quality of workmanship and together with our high standard of finishes and our attention to detail. This makes us a premier construction service provider. Each project we undertake receives the same high standards of excellence from commencement to completion.

We have successfully completed major renovations and additions throughout Toronto and the GTA. Leading a staff of dedicated and talented tradesmen and in association with skilled and trusted sub-trades, SABAT Construction has proven time and again that word of mouth referrals is proof that our work speaks for itself.
name: Sabat Construction & Architect Inc.
